::Savanna::
She listened and waited to see what the meeting would bring.  She 
kept seeing Blur glancing over her.  She though he resembled an 
amorous male lion in the mating season.  And she knew that she wasn't 
in heat. 
She just kept looking at the table and looking about the room for any 
sign of trouble.  She felt uncomfortable inside the ship. She was 
used to open and spacious plains.  Not the confines of the ship's 
walls. She wanted to go back outside.  But she had to finish this out.
SHe sat back in her corner and watched the room.  Only now she 
watched Phobia and Blurr.  She wondered wen the lion became the zebra.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Cheetors Revenge <Cheetor_2002@j...> wrote:
 Blur was quietly following Kluster and the other Maximals.  His mind 
was on something different however.  He couldn't help but look at the 
lion bot.  She was, in his visual receptors, beautiful.  He forced 
himself to talk slowly.  "So, Now that we're sittinghere.  What is 
the reason for this meeting?"  He glanced back at the lioness.
